Package org.apache.avalon.logging.impl

The provider package contains the LoggingManager which is an interface to the initial logging management system that leverages meta information about logging targets and catagories.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ConfigurationParameter A parameter descriptor that supports transformation of a a string url to an URL instance.
ConsoleLogger Logger sending everything to the standard output streams.
DefaultLoggingCriteria DefaultLoggingCriteria is a class holding the values supplied by a user for application to a LoggingManager factory.
LoggerParameter A parameter descriptor that supports transformation of a a string to a Logger instance.
 

Exception Summary
LoggingException Exception to indicate that there was a logging management related error.
 

Package org.apache.avalon.logging.impl Description

The provider package contains the LoggingManager which is an interface to the initial logging management system that leverages meta information about logging targets and catagories.
